1370: Herbert moved to Muurhuysen2.B.1 after marriage.
Got married to Berta at age 19 in 1370.
1372: Had a son with Berta, Rodolf, at age 21.
1374: Had a daughter with Berta, Siwa, at age 23.
1375: Had a son with Berta, Lubertus, at age 24.
1378: Had a daughter with Berta, Sarre, at age 27.
Lost son Lubertus when Lubertus was 4 years old.
1382: Had a son with Berta, Hildebrandus, at age 31.
1387: Had a son with Berta, Lennot, at age 36.
1392: Lost son Hildebrandus when Hildebrandus was 11 years old.
1394: Lost son Rodolf when Rodolf was 23 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
